name: Spooky Fortune Telling Dice VR
description:
Roll 6 different dice in VR to see your spooky fortune.

Made for 6 Hour Spooky Jam 2018. 

This is our first VR game, be nice! Tested with Windows Mixed Reality headsets.

Alex Bezuska - 3D Modelling, Fortune writing

Cara Bezuska - Textures, Fortune writing

Eric Lathrop - Programming
